snippet: The ventriloquist, Conrad Koch, said Monday that he would challenge a court order intended to silence his puppet.
abstract: Conrad Koch, South African ventriloquist, says that he will challenge court order intended to silence his puppet; Koch denies allegations that message from Twitter account of the puppet criticizing singer Steve Hofmeyr amounted to hate speech.
lead_paragraph: The ventriloquist, Conrad Koch, said Monday that he would challenge a court order intended to silence his puppet.

headline.main: South Africa: Court Order Muzzles Outspoken Puppet
headline.print_headline: South Africa: Court Order Muzzles Outspoken Puppet
